Press Release And Articles Promoting The Release Of The White Paper

Submitted by Rick Manelius on Wed Aug 07 00:00:00 -0600 2013

I’m extremely grateful to all of the individuals and companies that announced the release of white paper to their respective audiences. I will continue to update this list as additional articles/blog posts come to my attention.

  • Enhancing Drupal’s Reputation as a World-Class, Open-Source eCommerce Platform through PCI Compliance
  • Overview of PCI Compliance for Drupal Site Builders
  • Drupal PCI Compliance White Paper released
  • Drupal PCI Compliance White Paper—Officially Released!
  • SoundPost Media Publishes Drupal PCI Compliance White Paper
